content:
To reboot a CentOS 7 machine on Google Cloud using SSH, you can use the command:
```
sudo reboot
```
This command will reboot the machine immediately. If you want to shut down the machine and then power it back on, you can use the command:
```
sudo shutdown -r now
```
This will shut down the machine and then power it back on, the "-r" option is for reboot.
